eic_example1.c File Reference

Detailed Description

External Interrupt Controller Example.

  • Compiler: IAR EWAVR32 and GNU GCC for AVR32
  • Supported devices: All AVR32 devices with a Power Manager.
  • AppNote:

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/

00136 {
00137   eic_options_t eic_options;  // Structure holding the configuration parameters
00138                               // of the EIC module.
00139 
00140   // Enable LED0_GPIO on the EVK
00141   gpio_enable_gpio_pin(LED0_GPIO);
00142 
00143   // Enable level-triggered interrupt.
00144   eic_options.eic_mode   = EIC_MODE_LEVEL_TRIGGERED;
00145   // Interrupt will trigger on low-level.
00146   eic_options.eic_level  = EIC_LEVEL_LOW_LEVEL;
00147   // Enable filter.
00148   eic_options.eic_filter  = EIC_FILTER_ENABLED;
00149   // For Wake Up mode, initialize in asynchronous mode
00150   eic_options.eic_async  = EIC_ASYNCH_MODE;
00151   // Choose External Interrupt Controller Line
00152   eic_options.eic_line = EXT_INT_EXAMPLE_LINE; // Enable the NMI external interrupt line.
00153 
00154   // Map the interrupt line to the GPIO pin with the right peripheral function.
00155   gpio_enable_module_pin(EXT_INT_EXAMPLE_PIN_LINE,EXT_INT_EXAMPLE_FUNCTION_LINE);
00156 
00157   // Init the EIC controller with the options
00158   eic_init(&AVR32_EIC, &eic_options,1);
00159   // Enable External Interrupt Controller Line
00160   eic_enable_line(&AVR32_EIC, EXT_INT_EXAMPLE_LINE);
00161 
00162   // Switch the CPU to static sleep mode.
00163   // When the CPU is idle, it is possible to switch off the CPU clock and optionally other
00164   // clock domains to save power. This is activated by the sleep instruction, which takes the sleep
00165   // mode index number as argument. SLEEP function is defined in \DRIVERS\PM\pm.h.
00166   // In static mode, all oscillators, including 32KHz and RC oscillator are stopped.
00167   // Bandgap voltage reference BOD detector is turned off.
00168   SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_STATIC);
00169 
00170   // Activate LED0 pin in GPIO output mode and switch LED0 off.
00171   gpio_set_gpio_pin(LED0_GPIO);
00172 
00173   // Cpu now is in static sleep mode. When the wake-up external interrupt occurs,
00174   // the CPU resumes execution here and enter the while(1) loop.
00175   while(1)
00176   {
00177     gpio_tgl_gpio_pin(LED0_GPIO); // Toggle the LED0.
00178     software_delay();             // Just a dummy finite loop.
00179     // Interrupt Line must be cleared to enable next SLEEP action
00180     eic_clear_interrupt_line(&AVR32_EIC, EXT_INT_EXAMPLE_LINE);
00181 
00182     SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_STATIC); // re-enter sleep mode.
00183     // Cpu now is in static sleep mode. When the wake-up external interrupt occurs,
00184     // the CPU resumes execution back from the top of the while loop.
00185   }
00186 
00187 }
